review_blob: Slightly hazy orangeish copper, smells of bitter hops, slightly vegital/astringent. Taste is exactly the same, bitter and too malty. For 7$ whatever, but aside from ticking Id rather pay an extra couple of bucks. Ok budget buy, otherwise sucks.

Smells like dry and citrusy hops
Appears bright golden but cloudy with a pillowy head that is reluctant to recede.
Tastes of mostly just dry bitterness and second to that some citrus. The "white" of this ipa is not very apparent in the taste.
Overall, this would just be a great example of what session ipas should be. Flavorful, dry, bitter, and in this case it does have the fuller body implied in the wit/ipa combo.

Clear amber, most soda like head ever
Smells like a shoe
Tastes of sweet adjunct
Thin 
Overall a weak beer. Bud drinkers would enjoy this as a heavier alternative.
